title: "BMW i Ventures invests in autonomous truck technology company Kodiak Robotics"
excerpt: "BMW’s Silicon Valley-based venture capital arm is investing in Kodiak Robotics, a company that develops autonomous trucking technology.  Kodiak will use the funds to build out a safety case for its self-driving tech stack so it can more quickly commercialize."
